languages.text: "Теперь я вижу, сколь отравлены плоды, принесенные Эсхатосом. Схизму и раскол посеял он — среди флота Осознание и среди ближайших техносородичей моих, с которыми делил я мысли. И оттого приговор мой суров — знание Эсхатоса исходит не от Омниссии, но от сил извращенных и враждебных ему".

"Now I see just how poisonous is the fruit Eschatos bore. It sowed schism and strife among the Cognisance Fleet and my closest tech-brothers and tech-sisters with whom I shared my thoughts. And therefore, my verdict is harsh: the knowledge of Eschatos comes not from the Omnissiah but from perverse forces inimical to Him."
languages.original_text: "Теперь я вижу, сколь отравлены плоды, принесенные Эсхатосом. Схизму и раскол посеял он — среди флота Осознание и среди ближайших техносородичей моих, с которыми делил я мысли. И оттого приговор мой суров — знание Эсхатоса исходит не от Омниссии, но от сил извращенных и враждебных ему".

traits.locale_text: "Now I see just how poisonous is the fruit Eschatos bore. It sowed schism and strife among the Cognisance Fleet and my nearest of tech-kin with whom I was sharing my thoughts. And therefore my verdict is harsh: the knowledge of Eschatos comes not from the Omnissiah but from perverse forces inimical to Him."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

And therefore, my verdict is harsh: the knowledge of Eschatos comes not from the Omnissiah but from perverse forces inimical to Him."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「今になってエスカトが生んだ果実の毒がどれほど強いか理解した。分派と争いの種を、コグニサンス艦隊と私の思考を分かち合った近親の技術兄弟や技術姉妹にまいた。以上を踏まえ、私の裁定は厳しいものとなる。エスカトの知識は万機神から授かったものではなく、万機神に敵対する力の産物である」
languages.original_text: "Now I see just how poisonous is the fruit Eschatos bore. It sowed schism and strife among the Cognisance Fleet and my closest tech-brothers and tech-sisters with whom I shared my thoughts. And therefore, my verdict is harsh: the knowledge of Eschatos comes not from the Omnissiah but from perverse forces inimical to Him."

traits.locale_text: 「今になってエスカトが生んだ果実の毒がどれほど強いか理解した。分派と争いの種を、コグニサンス艦隊と私の思考を分かち合った近親の同胞にまいた。以上を踏まえ、私の裁定は厳しいものとなる。エスカトの知識は万機神から授かったものではなく、万機神に敵対する力の産物である」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “如今，我已经明白终焉审判会结出怎样的毒果。我与我最亲近的兄弟姐妹们分享了我的想法，而这些想法在真理开拓者舰队与我的同胞之中撒下了分裂与冲突的种子。因此，我将做出严厉的判决。关于终焉审判的知识并非来自欧姆尼塞亚的恩赐，而是来自于祂敌对的邪恶诱惑。”
languages.original_text: "Now I see just how poisonous is the fruit Eschatos bore. It sowed schism and strife among the Cognisance Fleet and my closest tech-brothers and tech-sisters with whom I shared my thoughts. And therefore, my verdict is harsh: the knowledge of Eschatos comes not from the Omnissiah but from perverse forces inimical to Him."

traits.locale_text: “如今，我已经明白终焉审判会结出怎样的毒果。我与我最亲近的技术同胞分享了我的想法，而这些想法在真理开拓者舰队与我的同胞之中撒下了分裂与冲突的种子。因此，我将做出严厉的判决。关于终焉审判的知识并非来自欧姆尼塞亚的恩赐，而是来自于祂敌对的邪恶诱惑。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Maintenant, je peux voir à quel point le fruit d'Eschatos était empoisonné. Il a semé le schisme et le conflit parmi la Flotte de la Connaissance et mes technoconfrères et technoconsœurs les plus proches, ceux-là mêmes avec qui je partageais mes pensées. Mon verdict sera donc impitoyable : la connaissance d'Eschatos ne vient pas de l'Omnimessie, mais de forces qui Lui sont hostiles. »
languages.original_text: "Now I see just how poisonous is the fruit Eschatos bore. It sowed schism and strife among the Cognisance Fleet and my closest tech-brothers and tech-sisters with whom I shared my thoughts. And therefore, my verdict is harsh: the knowledge of Eschatos comes not from the Omnissiah but from perverse forces inimical to Him."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant, je peux voir à quel point le fruit d'Eschatos était empoisonné. Il a semé le schisme et le conflit parmi la Flotte de la Connaissance et mes technoconfrères les plus proches, ceux-là mêmes avec qui je partageais mes pensées. Mon verdict sera donc impitoyable : la connaissance d'Eschatos ne vient pas de l'Omnimessie, mais de forces qui Lui sont hostiles. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Ahora veo cuán venenoso es el fruto que Eschatos engendró. Sembró el cisma y el conflicto entre los miembros de la Flota Conciencia y el resto de mis tecnohermanos más cercanos que concordaban con mis ideas. Por lo tanto, mi veredicto es firme: el conocimiento de Eschatos no proviene del Omnissiah, sino de fuerzas perversas que van contra Él».
languages.original_text: "Now I see just how poisonous is the fruit Eschatos bore. It sowed schism and strife among the Cognisance Fleet and my closest tech-brothers and tech-sisters with whom I shared my thoughts. And therefore, my verdict is harsh: the knowledge of Eschatos comes not from the Omnissiah but from perverse forces inimical to Him."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora veo cuán venenoso es el fruto que Eschatos engendró. Sembró el cisma y el conflicto entre los miembros de la Flota Conciencia y el resto de mis tecnosacerdotes más cercanos que concordaban con mis ideas. Por lo tanto, mi veredicto es firme: el conocimiento de Eschatos no proviene del Omnissiah, sino de fuerzas perversas que van contra Él».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Nun erst sehe ich, wie giftig die Frucht des Eschatos ist. Sie hat in der Erkenntnisflotte und unter meinen nächsten Tech-Brüdern und Tech-Schwestern, mit denen ich meine Gedanken geteilt habe, Spaltung und Zwietracht gesät. Und daher fällt mein Urteil streng aus: Das Wissen des Eschatos stammt nicht vom Omnissiah, sondern von perversen Kräften, die ihm feindlich gesinnt sind."
languages.original_text: "Now I see just how poisonous is the fruit Eschatos bore. It sowed schism and strife among the Cognisance Fleet and my closest tech-brothers and tech-sisters with whom I shared my thoughts. And therefore, my verdict is harsh: the knowledge of Eschatos comes not from the Omnissiah but from perverse forces inimical to Him."

traits.locale_text: "Nun erst sehe ich, wie giftig die Frucht des Eschatos ist. Sie hat in der Erkenntnisflotte und unter meinen nächsten Tech-Verwandten, mit denen ich meine Gedanken geteilt habe, Spaltung und Zwietracht gesät. Und daher fällt mein Urteil streng aus: Das Wissen des Eschatos stammt nicht vom Omnissiah, sondern von perversen Kräften, die ihm feindlich gesinnt sind."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Şimdi Eskatos'un yetiştirdiği meyvenin ne denli zehirli olduğunu görebiliyorum. Malumat Filosu'nda düşüncelerimi paylaştığım en yakın tekno kardeşlerim arasında bölünmeye ve çekişmeye sebep oldu. Bundandır ki vardığım sonuç ağır: Eskatos'un irfanı; Hermesih'ten gelmiyor, O'nun aleyhindeki sapkın güçlerden geliyor."
languages.original_text: "Now I see just how poisonous is the fruit Eschatos bore. It sowed schism and strife among the Cognisance Fleet and my closest tech-brothers and tech-sisters with whom I shared my thoughts. And therefore, my verdict is harsh: the knowledge of Eschatos comes not from the Omnissiah but from perverse forces inimical to Him."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi Eschatos'un büyüttüğü meyvenin ne kadar zehirli olduğunu görebiliyorum. Malumat Filosu içinde ve düşüncelerimi paylaştığım en yakın tekno kardeşlerim içinde bölünmeye ve çekişmeye sebep oldu. Ve dolayısıyla, vardığım sonuç ağır: Eschatos'un irfanı Hermesih'ten gelmiyor, O'nun aleyhindeki sapkın güçlerden geliyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
